amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $112,686,000 and reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $165 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $112,686,000 and to reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $165 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
